I really like the look of these pants. They create long and lean looking legs, and I barely have any legs being 4'10" and 103lbs. I have this in size Small. It is not tight on me as in hugging all my curves tightly, but they look more professional this way, and can definitely be worn to work with the right pairings. They are super long on my short frame. There's probably a good 6" under my feet, so I will have to hem them for sure. The fabric is smooth and comfortable against the skin. The only thing I dislike about these pants is the elastic waistband. The photos make it look smooth at the top of the waist, but it's bunchy elastic that stretches and somewhat smooths out when you wear it. It is tighter than I prefer as I don't like snug anything along my torso. The tightness of the band squeezes my waist causing lumps where there isn't any. I will wear this with a non crop top to hide this part. This is otherwise a very flattering pair of pants both for lengthening legs and accentuating my bum nicely.

The material of these pants is thick and stretchy yet feels soft and looks elegant. They are durable and feel of great quality. The pant legs are long and very wide at the bottom and can be used casually or professionally. The only thing is that these pants do not have a tummy control waist band but they are still a great value for the price.
These are so comfortable and stretchy. They also aren't too long. I'm 5'4" and they do go to the floor but wearing with a shoe with an inch or 2 heel is perfect.
I really love these pants, very comfortable and stretchy ❤️😍🥰. Fits perfectly the size and the quality is very nice. I’ll definitely get more colors in it.

My daughter is obsessed with these pants. They are very comfortable and have lots of wiggle room but the slip down the middle of the legs make it feel and look much more professional. Fair price for a great pair of pants we can wear at work or at home.
I absolutely love these. Very flattering fit and they are so comfortable. I like that you can order different lengths as these types of pants are usually too long on me.

These are nice for working out but I don't like them at all to wear as regular pants- maybe with a long sweater, but that's it.  They are very tight around the stomach- if you are really in great shape they might be very flattering- if not... well, at least for me, I don't think they show off my figure in a way that I would like.  The material is nice and soft- they are very long- that works well for me- I am 5'7 with a short torso and long legs.  Beware of camel toe.  lol... okay, I said it.  They are nice but miss the mark for me!

评论概述: Tall girl friendly and so comfortable
